Steps.Message: Update at 23:59 - Hi, it's Amy from the text messaging team. We've liaised with our engineers and they have advised that due to the nature of the fault, there's an extensive amount of work required before we are able to safely restore the power in the area. Due to the repairs still required, we've had to make a change to the estimated timeframe. We're now estimating to have the power back on between 01:30 and 02:30. I'm sorry we've had to change the timeframe and appreciate how frustrating this is. We will continue to communicate with the team and I will update you with any further news.

We became aware of a power cut at 14:35. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

Steps.Message: Engineers are now on site, carrying out investigations into the fault. Once they have completed their assessment, they will carry out repairs.
Steps.Name: Engineers investigating and fixing

Logs.Comment: Update at 23:59 - Hi, it's Amy from the text messaging team. We've liaised with our engineers and they have advised that due to the nature of the fault, there's an extensive amount of work required before we are able to safely restore the power in the area. Due to the repairs still required, we've had to make a change to the estimated timeframe. We're now estimating to have the power back on between 01:30 and 02:30. I'm sorry we've had to change the timeframe and appreciate how frustrating this is. We will continue to communicate with the team and I will update you with any further news.

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on an underground electricity cable affecting the local area.
